title: Headhunter Akali
body:
When u throw a Q, not the game, then there is a red lining, that appears shortly before it hits your target, similar to the sound of hitting.
The red lining looks like ur passive, but it fills one line shortly in the screen way bogger than it used to be.
I hope u fix that,
greetings,
a pleb summoner

replies.body: Heya! Thanks for the report! This is a known issue, but I can poke the bug and see where we're at with it!
